00015 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00016 Squad::Squad(GameWorld* world, int squadSize, ngl::Vec3 pos, float r, ngl::Obj *_mesh):Vehicle(world, pos, ngl::Vec3(0,0,0), 0.0f, 1.0f, 10.0f,1.0f, 1.0f, 0.5f)
00017 {  
00018   m_allArrived = false;
00019   m_inBlockade = false;
00020   m_generatedBlockade = false;
00021   m_squadSize = squadSize;
00022 
00023   m_previousState = squadPatrol;
00024 
00025   m_squadColour = ngl::Colour(0.0f,0.5f,0.5f,1.0f);
00026 
00027   m_squadRadius = squadSize*m_boundingRadius;
00028   m_mesh = _mesh;
00029 
00030   for (int i = 0; i < squadSize; ++i)
00031   {
00032     Police* newPolice = new Police(world, m_mesh);
00033     newPolice->setBoudingRadius(m_boundingRadius);
00034     newPolice->setDetectionRadius(3.5f);
00035     newPolice->setPos(ngl::Vec3((((float)rand()/RAND_MAX)*m_squadRadius*2)-m_squadRadius+ m_pos.m_x, 0.0f, (((float)rand()/RAND_MAX)*m_squadRadius*2)-m_squadRadius+ m_pos.m_z));
00036     world->getCellGraph()->initializeCells(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(newPolice->getID()));
00037     while (newPolice->getCurrentCellID() < 0)
00038     {
00039       newPolice->setPos(ngl::Vec3((((float)rand()/RAND_MAX)*m_squadRadius*2)-m_squadRadius+ m_pos.m_x, 0.0f, (((float)rand()/RAND_MAX)*m_squadRadius*2)-m_squadRadius+ m_pos.m_z));
00040       world->getCellGraph()->initializeCells(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(newPolice->getID()));
00041     }
00042     newPolice->setSquadPos(m_pos);
00043     newPolice->setSquadRadius(m_squadRadius);
00044     newPolice->setSquadID(m_ID);
00045     m_squadPolice.push_back(newPolice);
00046     m_policeArrived.push_back(false);
00047   }
00048   setSquadState("patrol", squadPatrol);
00049   m_selectionColour = s_nextSelectionColour;
00050 
00051   s_nextSelectionColour.m_x += 0.1;
00052 
00053   if(s_nextSelectionColour.m_x >= 1)
00054   {
00055     s_nextSelectionColour.m_x = 0;
00056     s_nextSelectionColour.m_y += 0.1;
00057 
00058     if(s_nextSelectionColour.m_y >= 1)
00059     {
00060       s_nextSelectionColour.m_y = 0;
00061       s_nextSelectionColour.m_z += 0.1;
00062     }
00063   }
00064 }

00066 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 Squad::~Squad()
00068 {
00069   BOOST_FOREACH(Police *p, m_squadPolice)
00070   {
00071       delete p;
00072   }
00073   m_squadPolice.clear();
00074   BOOST_FOREACH(Police *p, m_deadSquadPolice)
00075   {
00076       delete p;
00077   }
00078   m_deadSquadPolice.clear();
00079 }

00081 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 ngl::Vec3 Squad::averagePolicePos()
00085 {
00086   ngl::Vec3 currentTotal =0;
00087   for (int i = 0; i< m_squadSize; i++)
00088   {
00089     Police* currentPolice = m_squadPolice[i];
00090     currentTotal += currentPolice->getPos();
00091   }
00092    currentTotal /= m_squadSize;
00093   return currentTotal;
00094 }

00100 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 void Squad::update(double timeElapsed, double currentTime)
00102 {
00103   // squad checks
00104 
00105   // SQUAD MOVE
00106   if(m_squadState == squadMove )
00107   {
00108     m_pos = averagePolicePos();
00109 
00110     // check if all police have arrived- break if one hasn't
00111 
00112     m_allArrived = true;
00113 
00114     for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_squadSize; ++i)
00115     {
00116        Police* currentPolice = m_squadPolice[i];
00117        currentPolice->setIsMoving(false);
00118        if(m_policeArrived[i]==false)
00119        {
00120          //set to moving, sets the police to lua state move
00121          m_allArrived = false;
00122          currentPolice->setIsMoving(true);
00123          break;
00124        }
00125      }
00126     //switch out of move if police have ALL arrived
00127     if(m_allArrived == true)
00128     {
00129       m_squadState = m_previousState;
00130     }
00131   }
00132 
00133   // SQUAD WALL
00134   else if(m_squadState == squadWall)
00135   {
00136     this->formWall();
00137   }
00138 
00139 
00140   // individual police loop
00141   for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_squadSize; ++i)
00142   {
00143     Police* currentPolice = m_squadPolice[i];
00144     currentPolice->setSquadPos(m_pos);
00145     currentPolice->setSquadRadius(m_squadRadius);
00146 
00147     // MOVE
00148     if(m_squadState == squadMove)
00149     {
00150       if ((currentPolice->getPos() - m_target).lengthSquared()<= 4)
00151       {
00152         m_policeArrived[i] = true;
00153         currentPolice->setIsMoving(false);
00154       }
00155     }
00156     else
00157     {
00158       //WALL
00159       if (m_generatedBlockade == false)
00160       {
00161         currentPolice->setCrosshair(m_pos);
00162       }
00163       currentPolice->setIsMoving(false);
00164     }
00165 
00166     // WALL
00167     if(m_squadState == squadWall && m_generatedBlockade == true)
00168     {
00169       currentPolice->setBlockadePos(m_blockadePositions[i]);
00170     }
00171     else if(m_squadState != squadWall)
00172     {
00173       currentPolice->setBlockadePos(NULL);
00174     }
00175     //finally update the police
00176     currentPolice->update(timeElapsed, currentTime);
00177   }
00178 }

00183 void Squad::draw(ngl::Camera *cam, ngl::Mat4 mouseGlobalTX)
00184 {
00185 
00186     for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_squadSize; ++i)
00187     {
00188       Police* currentPolice = m_squadPolice[i];
00189       currentPolice->draw(cam, mouseGlobalTX);
00190     }
00191 
00192   loadMatricesToShader(cam, mouseGlobalTX);
00193   ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance()->createDisk("squad",m_squadRadius,12);
00194   ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance()->draw("squad");
00195 }

00199 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00200 void Squad::drawTarget(ngl::Camera *cam, ngl::Mat4 mouseGlobalTX)
00201 {
00202   if(m_squadState == squadMove)
00203   {
00204     ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00205     (*shader)["Phong"]->use();
00206     ngl::Material m(ngl::Colour(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.2775f,0.2775f,0.2775f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.77391f,0.77391f,0.77391f, 1.0));
00207     m.setSpecularExponent(5.f);
00208     m.setDiffuse(ngl::Colour(m_squadDrawColour.m_r+0.3f,m_squadDrawColour.m_g+0.3f,m_squadDrawColour.m_b+0.3f,m_squadDrawColour.m_a));
00209     m.loadToShader("material");
00210 
00211       ngl::Mat4 MV;
00212       ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00213       ngl::Mat3 normalMatrix;
00214       ngl::Mat4 M;
00215       ngl::Transformation trans;
00216       trans.setPosition(m_target.m_x, 0.005f, m_target.m_z);
00217       trans.setRotation(90.0,0.0,0.0);
00218 
00219     M=trans.getMatrix()*mouseGlobalTX;
00220     MV=  M*cam->getViewMatrix();
00221     MVP= M*cam->getVPMatrix();
00222     normalMatrix=MV;
00223     normalMatrix.inverse();
00224 
00225       shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
00226       shader->setShaderParamFromMat3("normalMatrix",normalMatrix);
00227 
00228 
00229 
00230 
00231     ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance()->createDisk("target",1.0,12);
00232     ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance()->draw("target");
00233   }
00234 }

00236 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00237 void Squad::loadMatricesToShader(ngl::Camera *cam, ngl::Mat4 mouseGlobalTX)
00238 {
00239   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00240     (*shader)["Phong"]->use();
00241 
00242   ngl::Material m(ngl::Colour(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.2775f,0.2775f,0.2775f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.77391f,0.77391f,0.77391f, 1.0));
00243   m.setSpecularExponent(5.f);
00244   m.setDiffuse(ngl::Colour(m_squadColour));
00245   m.loadToShader("material");
00246 
00247   ngl::Mat4 MV;
00248   ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00249   ngl::Mat3 normalMatrix;
00250   ngl::Mat4 M;
00251   ngl::Transformation trans;
00252   trans.setPosition(m_pos.m_x, 0.004, m_pos.m_z);
00253   trans.setRotation(90.0,15.0,0.0);
00254 
00255 
00256   M=trans.getMatrix()*mouseGlobalTX;
00257   MV=  M*cam->getViewMatrix();
00258   MVP= M*cam->getVPMatrix();
00259   normalMatrix=MV;
00260   normalMatrix.inverse();
00261   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
00262   shader->setShaderParamFromMat3("normalMatrix",normalMatrix);
00263 
00264 }

00266 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00269 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00270 bool Squad::checkSelectionColour(const ngl::Vec3 colour)
00271 {
00272   if(m_selectionColour.m_x >= colour.m_x-0.01f && m_selectionColour.m_x <= colour.m_x+0.01f &&
00273      m_selectionColour.m_y >= colour.m_y-0.01f && m_selectionColour.m_y <= colour.m_y+0.01f &&
00274      m_selectionColour.m_z >= colour.m_z-0.01f && m_selectionColour.m_z <= colour.m_z+0.01f)
00275   {
00276     return true;
00277   }
00278   else
00279   {
00280     return false;
00281   }
00282 }

00286 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00287 void Squad::selectionDraw(ngl::Camera *cam, ngl::Mat4 mouseGlobalTX)
00288 {
00289   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00290   (*shader)["nglColourShader"]->use();
00291   shader->setShaderParam4f("Colour", m_selectionColour.m_x, m_selectionColour.m_y,m_selectionColour.m_z, 1);
00292 
00293   ngl::Transformation t;
00294   t.setPosition(m_pos.m_x, 0.3, m_pos.m_z);
00295   t.setRotation(90.0,0.0,0.0);
00296 
00297   ngl::Mat4 M;
00298   ngl::Mat4 MV;
00299   ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00300 
00301   M=t.getMatrix()*mouseGlobalTX;
00302   MV=  M*cam->getViewMatrix();
00303   MVP= M*cam->getVPMatrix();
00304 
00305   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
00306 
00307   ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance()->createDisk("squad",m_squadRadius,120);
00308   ngl::VAOPrimitives::instance()->draw("squad");
00309 
00310 }

00314 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00315 void Squad::setTarget(const ngl::Vec3 _target)
00316 {
00317   if(m_squadState != squadMove)
00318   {
00319     m_previousState = m_squadState;
00320   }
00321 
00322   m_target = _target;
00323   for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_squadSize; ++i)
00324   {
00325     Police* currentPolice = m_squadPolice[i];
00326     currentPolice->setSquadPos(m_pos);
00327     currentPolice->setSquadRadius(m_squadRadius);
00328     currentPolice->findPath(_target);
00329     currentPolice->setIsMoving(true);
00330     m_policeArrived[i] = false;
00331   }
00332   m_allArrived = false;
00333   m_inBlockade = false;
00334   m_squadState = squadMove;
00335 }

00337 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00339 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00340 int Squad::checkDeaths()
00341 {
00342   int numberOfDeaths = 0;
00343   for(int i=0; i<m_squadSize; i++)
00344   {
00345     Police* currentPolice = m_squadPolice[i];
00346     if(currentPolice->getHealth()<=0)
00347     {
00348         currentPolice->death();
00349         m_entityMgr->removeEntity(dynamic_cast<BaseGameEntity*>(currentPolice));
00350         m_deadSquadPolice.push_back(currentPolice);
00351         m_squadPolice.erase(m_squadPolice.begin()+i);
00352         m_squadSize -= 1;
00353         numberOfDeaths++;
00354         i--;
00355     }
00356   }
00357   return numberOfDeaths;
00358 }

00362 {
00363   switch(_message.m_message)
00364   {
00365   case msgAttack:
00366 
00367     return true;
00368     break;
00369 
00370   default:
00371     std::cout<<"Squad: Message type not defined"<<std::endl;
00372     return false;
00373     break;
00374   }
00375 }

00377 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00380 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00381 void Squad::findClosestWalls(Squad* squad)
00382 {
00383   m_closestWalls.clear();
00384   std::vector<Wall> inWalls = squad->getCurrentCell().getWalls();
00385   std::vector<int> wallMemory;
00386   int numberOfWallsToCheck = inWalls.size();
00387 
00388   while (m_closestWalls.size() < numberOfWallsToCheck)
00389   {
00390     float shortestDist;
00391     Wall closestWall;
00392     int closestWallID = 0;
00393     bool isInMemory = false;
00394     for (int i = 0; i < numberOfWallsToCheck; i++ )
00395     {
00396       shortestDist = 10000000000.0f;
00397       isInMemory = false;
00398       for (std::vector<int>::iterator iter = wallMemory.begin(); iter != wallMemory.end(); ++iter)
00399       {
00400 
00401         if( *iter == i)
00402         {
00403           isInMemory = true;
00404           break;
00405         }
00406 
00407       }
00408       if(isInMemory == true){break;}
00409       Wall currentWall = inWalls[i];
00410       ngl::Vec3 currentCenter = (currentWall.start+currentWall.end)/2;
00411 
00412       ngl::Vec3 distance = (currentCenter-m_pos);
00413 
00414       if(distance.lengthSquared() < shortestDist)
00415       {
00416         shortestDist = distance.lengthSquared();
00417         closestWall = inWalls[i];
00418         closestWallID = i;
00419       }
00420     }
00421     wallMemory.push_back(closestWallID);
00422     m_closestWalls.push_back(closestWall);
00423 
00424   }
00425   inWalls.clear();
00426   wallMemory.clear();
00427 
00428 }

00430 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00433 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00434 void Squad::formWall()
00435 {
00436 
00437     m_inBlockade = false;
00438     int numberOfWallsToCheck =0;
00439     m_generatedBlockade = false;
00440     //check to make sure not already made
00441     if(m_generatedBlockade == false)
00442     {
00443       //update the closest walls vector
00444       findClosestWalls(this);
00445       numberOfWallsToCheck = m_closestWalls.size();
00446     }
00447 
00448     m_blockadePositions.clear();
00449     for(int i=0; i<numberOfWallsToCheck; i++)
00450     {
00451       if(m_generatedBlockade == false)
00452       {
00453           Wall currentWall = m_closestWalls[i];
00454           ngl::Vec3 currentNormal = currentWall.normal;
00455           ngl::Vec3 currentCenter = (currentWall.start+currentWall.end)/2;
00456           for(int j=0; j<numberOfWallsToCheck; j++)
00457           {
00458             //check not testing same wall against itself
00459             if(i!=j)
00460             {
00461               Wall testWall = m_closestWalls[j];
00462               ngl::Vec3 testNormal = testWall.normal;
00463               ngl::Vec3 testCenter = (testWall.start+testWall.end)/2;
00464 
00465               // if true this means two walls are facing each other
00466               if(currentNormal + testNormal == ngl::Vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0))
00467               {
00468                 //if vertical line
00469                 if(currentCenter.m_x - testCenter.m_x == 0)
00470                 {
00471                   ngl::Vec3 distance = currentCenter - testCenter;
00472                   ngl::Vec3 upperCenter = ngl::Vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);
00473 
00474                   //test which wall is the higher wall
00475                   if(currentCenter.m_z < testCenter.m_z)
00476                   {
00477                     upperCenter = currentCenter;
00478                   }
00479                   else if(currentCenter.m_z > testCenter.m_z)
00480                   {
00481                     upperCenter = testCenter;
00482                   }
00483                   float dist = distance.length();
00484                   float numberOf= dist/m_boundingRadius;
00485 
00486                   if(numberOf >= m_squadSize)
00487                   {
00488                     //calculate spacing for however many police in squad
00489                     float spacing = dist/(m_squadSize*2);
00490                     m_blockadePositions.clear();
00491                     for(int i =0; i< m_squadSize*2; i+=2)
00492                     {
00493                       //set position, the x value should be the middle of the squad as it is value that doesn't change
00494                       ngl::Vec3 position = ngl::Vec3(m_pos.m_x, 0.0, upperCenter.m_z +((i+1)*spacing));
00495                       m_blockadePositions.push_back(position);
00496                     }
00497 
00498                    }
00499                   m_generatedBlockade = true;
00500                   m_inBlockade = true;
00501                    break;
00502 
00503                   }
00504 
00505                 else if(currentCenter.m_z - testCenter.m_z == 0)
00506                 {
00507                   //if horizontal line
00508                   ngl::Vec3 distance = currentCenter - testCenter;
00509                   ngl::Vec3 leftCenter = ngl::Vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);
00510 
00511                   //test which wall is to the left
00512                   if(currentCenter.m_x < testCenter.m_x)
00513                   {
00514                     leftCenter = currentCenter;
00515                   }
00516                   else if(currentCenter.m_x > testCenter.m_x)
00517                   {
00518                     leftCenter = testCenter;
00519                   }
00520                   float dist = distance.length();
00521                   float numberOf= dist/m_boundingRadius;
00522 
00523                   if(numberOf >= m_squadSize)
00524                   {
00525                     //calculate spacing for however many police in squad
00526                     float spacing = dist/(m_squadSize*2);
00527 
00528                     m_blockadePositions.clear();
00529                     for(int i =0; i< m_squadSize*2; i+=2)
00530                     {
00531                       //set position, the x value should be the middle of the squad as it is value that doesn't change
00532                       ngl::Vec3 position = ngl::Vec3(leftCenter.m_x +((i+1)*spacing), 0.0, m_pos.m_z);
00533                       m_blockadePositions.push_back(position);
00534                     }
00535                    }
00536                   m_generatedBlockade = true;
00537                   m_inBlockade = true;
00538                   break;
00539 
00540                 }
00541                 else
00542                 {
00543                   m_generatedBlockade = false;
00544                   m_inBlockade = false;
00545 
00546                   std::cout<<" CANT FORM WALL "<<std::endl;
00547                 }
00548 
00549 
00550                }
00551               else
00552               {
00553                 m_generatedBlockade = false;
00554                 m_inBlockade = false;
00555 
00556                std::cout<<" CANT FORM WALL"<<std::endl;
00557               }
00558 
00559             }
00560           }
00561         }
00562       }
00563 }

00567 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00568 void Squad::setSquadState(const char *_luaState, eSquadState _enumState)
00569 {
00570   m_squadState = _enumState;
00571   for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_squadSize; ++i)
00572   {
00573     Police* currentPolice = m_squadPolice[i];
00574     currentPolice->getStateMachine()->changeState(_luaState);
00575   }
00576 }
